description:
Geraldo`s Reuniclus participated in the Pok√©mon World Tournament Junior Cup at the Kagome Town stadium. In the first round it was in the sixth match and faced off against Cassie`s Sawsbuck. The match quickly showcased Geraldo`s Reuniclus finishing off Cassie`s Sawsbuck to win the battle which allowed Geraldo to advance to the second round while Cassie was eliminated from the tournament.
None of Geraldo`s Reuniclus moves are exactly known but it does know an electric move.
name: Lanculus (Hirokazu)
